Uses of Class
org.descripter.js.api.core.CArray

  • Packages that use CArray 
    Package Description
    org.descripter.js.api
    Emulates the key features of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.api.core
    Represents the core objects of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.api.global
    Represents the global functions for core objects of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.ss
    A simplest HTTP server for running Server-Side JavaScript scriptlets and JavaScript Server Pages.

      Sorts the elements of the current array instance in place by arranging them in alphabetical order (more precisely, the order determined by the character encoding).
      CArray CArray.sort(Function<?> orderer)
      Sorts the elements of the current array instance with the custom ordering function orderer.
      CArray CArray.splice(CArray args)
      Deletes elements, numbered by the second value of args, starting with and including the element positioned by the first value of args, and replaces them with the values listed by args from the third value.
      CArray CArray.splice(int start)
      Deletes zero or more array elements starting with and including the element positioned by start.
      CArray CArray.splice(int start, int deleteCount)
      Deletes deleteCount elements of the current array instance starting with and including the element positioned by start.
      CArray CArray.splice(int start, int deleteCount, CArray values)
      Deletes deleteCount elements starting with and including the element positioned by start and replaces them with the argument values.
